Table.Name: Release
Table.Description: Contains the release details for each survey curated within the VSA

Column.Name: surveyID
Column.Description: the unique identifier for the survey

Column.Name: releaseNum
Column.Description: the release number

Column.Name: releaseDate
Column.Description: the release date

Column.Name: description
Column.Description: a brief description of the release

Column.Name: dbName
Column.Description: the name of the SQL Server database containing this release

Table.Name: RequiredTile
Table.Description: Contains details of default stack image products curated in the archive

Column.Name: programmeID
Column.Description: the unique programme ID

Column.Name: productID
Column.Description: A unique identifier assigned to each required stack product entry

Column.Name: name
Column.Description: Name of the stacked product

Column.Name: description
Column.Description: Description of the product

Column.Name: filterID
Column.Description: UID of combined filter (assigned in VSA: 1=Z,2=Y,3=J,4=H,5=Ks)

Column.Name: ra
Column.Description: Right Ascension of stack centre

Column.Name: dec
Column.Description: Declination of stack centre

Column.Name: nustep
Column.Description: Amount of microstepping

Column.Name: stackRadius
Column.Description: radius within which intermediate stacks are selected for this deep stack.

Column.Name: fieldID
Column.Description: UID of position on sky.

Column.Name: posAngle
Column.Description: Orientation of image x-axis to N-S

Table.Name: ProgrammeTable
Table.Description: Contains details of the set of curated tables for each programme

Column.Name: programmeID
Column.Description: the unique programme ID

Column.Name: tableID
Column.Description: the unique table ID

Column.Name: tableName
Column.Description: the name of the table

Column.Name: sourceIDName
Column.Description: the name of the source

Table.Name: vikingSourceXDR7PhotoObj
Table.Description: Cross-neighbours between viking and PhotoObj

Column.Name: masterObjID
Column.Description: The unique ID in vikingSource (=sourceID)

Column.Name: slaveObjID
Column.Description: The unique ID of the neighbour in BestDR7..PhotoObj (=objID)

Column.Name: distanceMins
Column.Description: Angular separation between neighbours

Column.Name: sdssType
Column.Description: SDSS type of neighbour: 3=galaxy; 6=star

Column.Name: sdssPrimary
Column.Description: SDSS flag for neighbour being primary (1) or secondary (0)

Table.Name: vikingSourceXDR5lasSource
Table.Description: Cross-neighbours between viking and lasSource

Column.Name: masterObjID
Column.Description: The unique ID in vikingSource (=sourceID)

Column.Name: slaveObjID
Column.Description: The unique ID of the neighbour in UKIDSSDR5PLUS..lasSource (=sourceID)

Column.Name: distanceMins
Column.Description: Angular separation between neighbours

Table.Name: ProgrammeFrame
Table.Description: Contains details of which image(s) belong to which Programme(s

Column.Name: multiframeID
Column.Description: the UID of the relevant multiframe

Column.Name: cuEventID
Column.Description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

Column.Name: ppErrBitsStatus
Column.Description: Bit flag to denote whether detection quality flagging has been done on this multiframe for this programme.

Table.Name: vikingSourceXtwomass_psc
Table.Description: Cross-neighbours between viking and twomass_psc

Column.Name: masterObjID
Column.Description: The unique ID in vikingSource (=sourceID)

Column.Name: slaveObjID
Column.Description: The unique ID of the neighbour in TWOMASS..twomass_psc (=pts_key)

Column.Name: distanceMins
Column.Description: Angular separation between neighbours

Table.Name: Survey
Table.Description: Contains information about the curated surveys within the VSA

Column.Name: surveyID
Column.Description: The unique identifier for the curated survey

Column.Name: name
Column.Description: The short name for the survey

Column.Name: description
Column.Description: A concise description of the survey

Column.Name: dbNamePrefix
Column.Description: A string that prefixes all database names released for this survey

Column.Name: proprietary
Column.Description: Logical flag indicating whether a survey is proprietary or not (1=yes; 0=no)

Table.Name: MultiframeEsoKeys
Table.Description: Contains details of all hierarchical ESO attributes for the primary HDU

Column.Name: multiframeID
Column.Description: the UID of the relevant multiframe

Column.Name: cuEventID
Column.Description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

Table.Name: ProductLinks
Table.Description: Contains links between different products, e.g. tiles and stacks, mosaics and tiles, mosaics and stack

Column.Name: programmeID
Column.Description: the unique programme ID

Column.Name: combiProductID
Column.Description: Product ID of combination frame

Column.Name: intProductID
Column.Description: Product ID of intermediate frame

Column.Name: combiProdType
Column.Description: Type (stack,tile,mosaic) of combination frame

Column.Name: intProdType
Column.Description: Type (stack,tile,mosaic) of intermediate frame

Table.Name: vikingDetection

Column.Name: extNum

Column.Name: cuEventID
Column.Description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

Column.Name: filterID

Column.Name: hlCircRadAs
Column.Description: Circular half-light radius computed from curve of growth assuming petrosian flux is 90% of total

Column.Name: hlCircRadErrAs
Column.Description: Error in hlCircRadAs

Column.Name: hlGeoRadAs
Column.Description: Geometric half-light radius

Column.Name: hlSMnRadAs
Column.Description: Half-light semi-minor axis

Column.Name: hlSMjRadAs
Column.Description: Half-light semi-major axis

Column.Name: hlCorSMnRadAs
Column.Description: Seeing corrected Half-light semi-minor axis

Column.Name: hlCorSMjRadAs
Column.Description: Seeing corrected Half-light semi-major axis

Column.Name: petroMag
Column.Description: Calibrated Petrosian magnitude within circular aperture r_p

Column.Name: petroMagErr
Column.Description: error on calibrated Petrosian magnitude

Column.Name: kronMag
Column.Description: Calibrated Kron magnitude within circular aperture r_k

Column.Name: kronMagErr
Column.Description: error on calibrated Kron magnitude

Column.Name: halfMag
Column.Description: Calibrated magnitude within circular aperture halfRad

Column.Name: halfMagErr
Column.Description: Calibrated error on Half magnitude

Column.Name: ra
Column.Description: Celestial Right Ascension

Column.Name: dec
Column.Description: Celestial Declination

Column.Name: cx

Column.Name: cy

Column.Name: cz
Column.Description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates

Column.Name: b
Column.Description: Galactic latitude

Column.Name: lambda

Column.Name: eta
Column.Description: SDSS system spherical co-ordinate 2

Column.Name: psfMag

Column.Name: psfMagErr
Column.Description: Error on PSF-fitted calibrated magnitude

Column.Name: SerMag1D

Column.Name: SerMag2D
Column.Description: Calibrated 2D Sersic flux

Column.Name: deltaMag
Column.Description: sum of magnitude corrections for faster processing

Column.Name: illumCorr
Column.Description: illumination correction

Column.Name: distortCorr
Column.Description: distortion correction

Column.Name: saturatCorr
Column.Description: saturation correction

Column.Name: ppErrBits
Column.Description: additional WFAU post-processing error bits

Column.Name: deprecated
Column.Description: Code for a current (=0) or deprecated (!=0) detection

Table.Description: Contains the current astrometric calibration coefficients

Column.Name: extNum
Column.Description: the extension number of this frame

Column.Name: distortMap
Column.Description: filename of 2d non-linear distortion map

Column.Name: centralRa
Column.Description: RA (J2000) at device centre

Column.Name: centralDec
Column.Description: Dec (J2000) at device centre

Column.Name: cx
Column.Description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates of device centre

Column.Name: cy
Column.Description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates of device centre

Column.Name: cz
Column.Description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates of device centre

Column.Description: Hierarchical Triangular Mesh (HTM) index, 20 deep, for equatorial co-ordinates of device centre

Column.Name: posAngle
Column.Description: orientation of image x-axis to N-S

Column.Name: l
Column.Description: Galactic longitude of device centre

Column.Name: b
Column.Description: Galactic latitude of device centre

Column.Name: lambda
Column.Description: SDSS system spherical co-ordinate 1 of device centre

Column.Name: eta
Column.Description: SDSS system spherical co-ordinate 2 of device centre

Column.Name: imageExtent
Column.Description: The maximum angular extent from the central position

Column.Name: minRa
Column.Description: The minimum RA (J2000) on the device

Column.Name: minDec
Column.Description: The minimum Dec (J2000) on the device

Column.Name: maxRa
Column.Description: The maximum RA (J2000) on the device

Column.Name: maxDec
Column.Description: The maximum Dec (J2000) on the device

Column.Name: xPixSize
Column.Description: Angular size of pixels in X

Column.Name: yPixSize
Column.Description: Angular size of pixels in Y

Column.Description: UID (unique over entire VSA via programme ID prefix) of this merged detection as assigned by merge algorithm

Column.Name: cuEventID
Column.Description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

Column.Name: frameSetID
Column.Description: frame set ID, unique over the whole VSA via programme ID prefix, assigned by merging procedure

Column.Name: ra
Column.Description: Mean Right Ascension

Column.Name: dec
Column.Description: Mean Declination

Column.Name: sigRa
Column.Description: Uncertainty in mean RA

Column.Name: sigDec
Column.Description: Uncertainty in mean Dec

Column.Name: expAstErr
Column.Description: Rms calculated from polynomial fit to minimum astrometric RMS as a function of magnitude

Column.Name: epoch
Column.Description: Epoch of measurement

Column.Name: muRa
Column.Description: Proper motion in RA

Column.Name: muDec
Column.Description: Proper motion in Dec

Column.Name: sigMuRa
Column.Description: Error on proper motion in RA

Column.Name: sigMuDec
Column.Description: Error on proper motion in Dec

Column.Name: parallax
Column.Description: Parallax of star

Column.Name: minPllx
Column.Description: Lower limit of 90% confidence interval for parallax measurement

Column.Name: maxPllx
Column.Description: Upper limit of 90% confidence interval for parallax measurement

Column.Name: chi2
Column.Description: Chi-squared value of astrometric solution

Column.Name: nFrames
Column.Description: Number of frames with good detections used to calculate astrometric fits

Column.Name: jnGoodObs
Column.Description: Number of good detections in J band

Column.Name: jnFlaggedObs
Column.Description: Number of detections in J band flagged as potentially spurious by vikingDetection.ppErrBits

Column.Name: jnMissingObs
Column.Description: Number of J band frames that this object should have been detected on and was not

Column.Name: jbestAper
Column.Description: Best aperture (1-6) for photometric statistics in the J band

Column.Name: jminCadence
Column.Description: minimum gap between observations

Column.Name: jmedCadence
Column.Description: median gap between observations

Column.Name: jmaxCadence
Column.Description: maximum gap between observations

Column.Name: jtotalPeriod
Column.Description: total period of observations (last obs-first obs)

Column.Name: jmeanMag
Column.Description: Mean J magnitude

Column.Name: jmedianMag
Column.Description: Median J magnitude

Column.Name: jMagRms
Column.Description: rms of J magnitude

Column.Name: jMagMAD
Column.Description: Median Absolute Deviation of J magnitude

Column.Name: jskewness
Column.Description: Skewness in J band (see Sesar et al. 2007)

Column.Name: jMinMag
Column.Description: Minimum magnitude in J band, of good detections

Column.Name: jMaxMag
Column.Description: Maximum magnitude in J band, of good detections

Column.Name: jNgt3sig
Column.Description: Number of good detections in J-band that are more than 3 sigma deviations

Column.Name: jExpRms
Column.Description: Rms calculated from polynomial fit to modal RMS as a function of magnitude in J band

Column.Name: jIntRms
Column.Description: Intrinsic rms in J-band

Column.Name: jchiSqpd
Column.Description: Chi square (per degree of freedom) fit to data (mean and expected rms)

Column.Name: jndof
Column.Description: Number of degrees of freedom for chisquare

Column.Name: jprobVar
Column.Description: Probability of variable from chi-square (and other data)

Column.Name: jVarClass
Column.Description: Classification of variability in this band

Column.Name: variableClass
Column.Description: Classification of objects across all bands.

Table.Name: vikingSource
Table.Description: Contains merged sources from detections in vikingDetection

Column.Name: sourceID
Column.Description: UID (unique over entire VSA via programme ID prefix) of this merged detection as assigned by merge algorithm

Column.Name: cuEventID
Column.Description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

Column.Name: frameSetID
Column.Description: UID of the set of frames that this merged source comes from

Column.Name: ra
Column.Description: Celestial Right Ascension

Column.Name: dec
Column.Description: Celestial Declination

Column.Name: cx
Column.Description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates

Column.Name: cy
Column.Description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates

Column.Name: cz
Column.Description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates

Column.Name: htmID
Column.Description: Hierarchical Triangular Mesh (HTM) index, 20 deep, for equatorial co-ordinates

Column.Name: l
Column.Description: Galactic longitude

Column.Name: b
Column.Description: Galactic latitude

Column.Name: lambda
Column.Description: SDSS system spherical co-ordinate 1

Column.Name: eta
Column.Description: SDSS system spherical co-ordinate 2

Column.Name: priOrSec
Column.Description: Seam code for a unique (=0) or duplicated (!=0) source (eg. flags overlap duplicates).

Column.Name: zmyPnt
Column.Description: Point source colour Z-Y (using aperMag3)

Column.Name: zmyPntErr
Column.Description: Error on point source colour Z-Y

Column.Name: ymjPnt
Column.Description: Point source colour Y-J (using aperMag3)

Column.Name: ymjPntErr
Column.Description: Error on point source colour Y-J

Column.Name: jmhPnt
Column.Description: Point source colour J-H (using aperMag3)

Column.Name: jmhPntErr
Column.Description: Error on point source colour J-H

Column.Name: hmksPnt
Column.Description: Point source colour H-Ks (using aperMag3)

Column.Name: hmksPntErr
Column.Description: Error on point source colour H-Ks

Column.Name: zmyExt
Column.Description: Extended source colour Z-Y (using aperMagNoAperCorr3)

Column.Name: zmyExtErr
Column.Description: Error on extended source colour Z-Y

Column.Name: ymjExt
Column.Description: Extended source colour Y-J (using aperMagNoAperCorr3)

Column.Name: ymjExtErr
Column.Description: Error on extended source colour Y-J

Column.Name: jmhExt
Column.Description: Extended source colour J-H (using aperMagNoAperCorr3)

Column.Name: jmhExtErr
Column.Description: Error on extended source colour J-H

Column.Name: hmksExt
Column.Description: Extended source colour H-Ks (using aperMagNoAperCorr3)

Column.Name: hmksExtErr
Column.Description: Error on extended source colour H-Ks

Column.Name: mergedClassStat
Column.Description: Merged N(0,1) stellarness-of-profile statistic

Column.Name: mergedClass
Column.Description: Class flag from available measurements (1|0|-1|-2|-3|-9=galaxy|noise|stellar|probableStar|probableGalaxy|saturated)

Column.Name: pStar
Column.Description: Probability that the source is a star

Column.Name: pGalaxy
Column.Description: Probability that the source is a galaxy

Column.Name: pNoise
Column.Description: Probability that the source is noise

Column.Name: pSaturated
Column.Description: Probability that the source is saturated

Column.Name: eBV
Column.Description: The galactic dust extinction value measured from the Schlegel, Finkbeiner & Davis (1998) maps. This uses the correction given in Bonifacio, Monai & Beers (2000). This correction reduces the extinction value in regions of high extinction (E(B-V)>0.1)

Column.Name: aZ
Column.Description: The galactic extinction correction in the Z band for extragalactic objects

Column.Name: aY
Column.Description: The galactic extinction correction in the Y band for extragalactic objects

Column.Name: aJ
Column.Description: The galactic extinction correction in the J band for extragalactic objects

Column.Name: aH
Column.Description: The galactic extinction correction in the H band for extragalactic objects

Column.Name: aKs
Column.Description: The galactic extinction correction in the Ks band for extragalactic objects

Column.Name: zPetroMag
Column.Description: Extended source Z mag (Petrosian)

Column.Name: zPetroMagErr
Column.Description: Error in extended source Z mag (Petrosian)

Column.Name: zPsfMag
Column.Description: Point source profile-fitted Z mag

Column.Name: zPsfMagErr
Column.Description: Error in point source profile-fitted Z mag

Column.Name: zSerMag2D
Column.Description: Extended source Z mag (profile-fitted)

Column.Name: zSerMag2DErr
Column.Description: Error in extended source Z mag (profile-fitted)

Column.Description: Default point source Z aperture corrected mag (2.0 arcsec aperture diameter)

Column.Description: Error in default point/extended source Z mag (2.0 arcsec aperture diameter)

Column.Name: zAperMag4
Column.Description: Point source Z aperture corrected mag (2.8 arcsec aperture diameter)

Column.Description: Error in point/extended source Z mag (2.8 arcsec aperture diameter)

Column.Description: Point source Z aperture corrected mag (5.7 arcsec aperture diameter)

Column.Description: Error in point/extended source Z mag (5.7 arcsec aperture diameter)

Column.Description: Extended source Z aperture mag (2.8 arcsec aperture diameter)

Column.Name: zAperMagNoAperCorr6

Column.Name: zHlCorSMjRadAs

Column.Description: RMS of axes of ellipse fit in Z

Column.Name: zEll
Column.Description: 1-b/a, where a/b=semi-major/minor axes in Z

Column.Name: zPA
Column.Description: ellipse fit celestial orientation in Z

Column.Name: zErrBits
Column.Description: processing warning/error bitwise flags in Z

Column.Name: zAverageConf
Column.Description: average confidence in 2 arcsec diameter default aperture (aper3) Z

Column.Name: zClass

Column.Name: zClassStat
Column.Description: N(0,1) stellarness-of-profile statistic in Z

Column.Description: Offset of Z detection from master position (+north/-south)

Table.Name: RequiredFilters
Table.Description: Contains required filters used for every programme held in the VSA

Column.Name: programmeID
Column.Description: the unique programme ID

Column.Name: filterID
Column.Description: UID of combined filter (assigned in VSA: 1=Z,2=Y,3=J,4=H,5=Ks)

Column.Name: nPass
Column.Description: the number of passes that will be made

Column.Name: isSynoptic
Column.Description: is the band observed multiple times for variability measurements (0 FALSE, 1 TRUE)

Table.Name: Programme
Table.Description: Contains details of the VISTA public survey programmes

Column.Name: programmeID
Column.Description: UID of the archived programme coded as above

Column.Name: title
Column.Description: a short title for the programme, eg. "VISTA Hemisphere Survey"

Column.Name: description
Column.Description: a concise description of the programme

Column.Name: reference
Column.Description: a web reference (URL) for the programme

Column.Name: propPeriod
Column.Description: the proprietory period for any data taken for this programme in months, e.g. 12 for open time.

Column.Name: dfsIDString
Column.Description: The description used within the data flow system (i.e. the value of the appropriate FITS keyword)

Column.Name: catalogueSchema
Column.Description: Script file that describes the catalogue schema

Column.Name: detectionTable
Column.Description: Table name of detections

Column.Name: sourceTable
Column.Description: Table name of merged sources

Column.Name: listRemeasTable
Column.Description: Table name of individual passband list re-measurements

Column.Name: sourceRemeasTable
Column.Description: Table name of co-located list re-measurements

Column.Name: mergeLogTable
Column.Description: Table name of curation log for source merging

Column.Name: frameSetTolerance
Column.Description: The match tolerance for different passband frames

Column.Name: pairingCriterion
Column.Description: The pairing criterion for associating detections into merged sources

Column.Name: adjacentFrameTolerance
Column.Description: The match tolerance for adjacent frames in the survey

Column.Name: neighboursSchema
Column.Description: Script file that describes the neighbour tables schema for this programme

Column.Name: synopticSourceTable
Column.Description: Table name of merged variable sources

Column.Name: synopticBestMatchTable
Column.Description: Table name of merged variable sources

Column.Name: variabilityTable
Column.Description: Table name of merged variable sources

Column.Name: mosaicTool
Column.Description: Name of mosaicing tool to be used

Column.Name: extractTool
Column.Description: Name of extraction tool to be used

Column.Name: bandMergingCriterion
Column.Description: maximum timespan over which different filters are merged into sources in the synoptic source table.

Column.Name: isLowGalacticLat
Column.Description: Is this a low galactic latitude field (No=0/Yes=1)

Column.Name: sourceProdType
Column.Description: The product type to be used to create the source table. (stack, tile, mosaic)

Column.Name: epochFrameType
Column.Description: The frame type to be used for each epoch (stack, tile)

Column.Name: posAngleTolerance
Column.Description: The position angle tolerance used when creating deep stacks and tiles

Column.Name: synopticSetUp
Column.Description: A string describing the synoptic setup for more complicated surveys

Table.Name: PhotCalVers
Table.Description: Contains details of all photometric calibration versions in the VSA

Column.Name: versNum
Column.Description: the version number of the calibration

Column.Name: cuEventID
Column.Description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

Column.Name: startDate
Column.Description: Date time of start time for this version of the calibration (MM-DD-YYYY)

Column.Name: endDate
Column.Description: Date time of end time for this version of the calibration (MM-DD-YYYY)

Table.Name: vikingSourceXgrs_sgpSource
Table.Description: Cross-neighbours between viking and grs_sgpSource

Column.Name: masterObjID
Column.Description: The unique ID in vikingSource (=sourceID)

Column.Name: slaveObjID
Column.Description: The unique ID of the neighbour in TWODFGRS..grs_sgpSource (=SEQNUM)

Column.Name: distanceMins
Column.Description: Angular separation between neighbours
